statements: DELETE FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE date = '2022-06-01' AND time = '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE demand_kwh > 1000 AND forecasted_demand_kwh < 900
DELETE FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
DELETE FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-10-15' AND forecast_time = '08:00:00' AND demand_kwh < 1000;
DELETE FROM ChargingSchedule WHERE charging_station_id = 5 AND energy_consumed_kwh > 500 AND schedule_date = '2022-11-20';
DELETE FROM charging_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND scheduled_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM ChargingStations WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionForecast WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2022-10-15'
DELETE FROM ChargingEvents WHERE date = '2022-09-20' AND start_time > '12:00:00'
